extension_description.message: Open tabs in floating or docked panels outside of Chrome. Like your TV’s picture in picture mode, but for websites! Open sourced.

setup_intro.message: We’ll need to set up a few things before you can start keeping tabs on your tabs.
setup_intro.description: Use your imagination when translating this string; try to have a terrible pun in it.

enable_panels_description.message:
Panels is still an experimental feature. You need to tell Chrome to switch it on via the Flags page.

On the Flags page, click the Enable link below Enable Panels at the top of the page.
enable_panels_description.description: Be sure to wrap everything in paragraph tags.

restart_chrome_description.message:
Chrome needs to be restarted for the changes to take effect.

Your tabs and windows will be re-opened afterwards and this setup will continue.
restart_chrome_description.description: Be sure to wrap everything in paragraph tags.

test_panels_description.message: Almost done! We just need to ensure that panels work properly.
test_panels_description.description: Be sure to wrap everything in paragraph tags.

skip_setup_link.message: I’m an expert, skip the setup.

skip_setup_warning.message: The extension might not work at all if you skip the setup. Only use this if you know what you’re doing.

help_notification_message.message: Click the “Enable” link below “Enable Panels” at the top of the page.

panels_not_enabled_error.message:
Oops, looks like panels couldn’t be enabled. Please try enabling them again.

If the problem continues, please restart your computer to ensure that all Chrome processes get restarted.

If that doesn’t work either, contact me via the extension’s page on the Chrome Web Store.

share_text.message: If you enjoy this extension, I’d really appreciate if you showed it by $review_link$ or by sharing this with your friends.

not_asked_again.message: If you choose not to, no worries. You won’t be asked again.

make_new_panel.message: Pop this tab into a panel

no_open_panels.message: Your open panels will appear here so you can turn them into tabs again.
